ComicInfo.Summary:
A catalog of the various types of overweight men's breasts.
New words to the Battle Hymn of The Republic showcasing the 2009 financial crisis and the government's mishandling and bailouts.
Captions applied to art masterpieces.
A collection of comic strips.
The Gray Spy lures the other two into a burning building with a hologram of herself.
Parody of tv show "The Apprentice" with dead celebrities.
Various short satires of pop culture.
